predicate.note: Frames file for 'stew' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.3, Framenet entries Heat and Apply heat.

roleset.name: cook for a long time in thick liquid

example.name: both args
example.text: John is stewing some rutabagas for dinner.

example.name: worry wart
example.text: Bob Stone stewed over a letter from his manager putting him on probation for insubordination.
